comment: Trump was very prescient tonight when he warned of the danger in knocking out all the chump candidates like Pocahontas and DaNang Dick early and ending up facing someone who's actually good. Nobody mentions her. She's laying low. She's disgusting but Liberals will explode with enthusiasm. Michelle Obama is a very dangerous Communist, Globalist traitor
amr:
# ::snt Trump was very prescient tonight when he warned of the danger in knocking out all the chump candidates like Pocahontas and DaNang Dick early and ending up facing someone who's actually good. Nobody mentions her. She's laying low. She's disgusting but Liberals will explode with enthusiasm. Michelle Obama is a very dangerous Communist, Globalist traitor
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / prescient
            :degree (v / very)
            :domain (p2 / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Trump"))
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :dayperiod (n2 / night)
                  :mod (t / today))
            :time (w / warn-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (d2 / danger
                        :domain (a / and
                              :op1 (k / knock-out-03
                                    :ARG0 p2
                                    :ARG1 (c / candidate
                                          :mod (c2 / chump)
                                          :example (a2 / and
                                                :op1 (p3 / person
                                                      :name (n3 / name
                                                            :op1 "Pocahontas"))
                                                :op2 (p4 / person
                                                      :name (n4 / name
                                                            :op1 "DaNang"
                                                            :op2 "Dick"))))
                                    :time (e / early))
                              :op2 (e2 / end-up-03
                                    :ARG1 p2
                                    :ARG2 (f / face-01
                                          :ARG0 p2
                                          :ARG1 (s / someone
                                                :ARG1-of (g / good-02
                                                      :ARG1-of (a3 / actual-02)))))))))
      :snt2 (m2 / mention-01
            :ARG0 (n5 / nobody)
            :ARG1 (s2 / she))
      :snt3 (d3 / disgust-01
            :ARG0 (s3 / she))
      :snt4 (e3 / explode-02
            :ARG1 (p5 / person
                  :ARG1-of (l / liberal-02))
            :manner (e4 / enthusiastic-03
                  :ARG0 p5))
      :snt5 (b / betray-01
            :ARG0 (p6 / person
                  :name (n6 / name
                        :op1 "Michelle"
                        :op2 "Obama"))
            :mod (p7 / political-movement
                  :name (n7 / name
                        :op1 "communism"))
            :mod (d4 / dangerous
                  :degree (v2 / very))
            :mod (g2 / globeist)))
